website_summaries.verdict: This clear resin cures to a similar finish and tensile strength to ABS plastic. It's designed for use in SLA UV printers between 355 and 420 nanometers.
pros: Can be used for engineering components
Use with PEFT film or FEP film resin tank
Can be used with color pigments
cons: Longer-term exposure to ultraviolet rays may yellow this clear resin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic prints
customer_reviews.text: Great resin, great prints. Cleaning is difficult, but that's to be expected. Be sure to have 99% alcohol on hand for cleaning the resin tank of your printer, the prints, and any spillage. If you're using this with a Sparkmaker printer, also be sure to have a set of strong uv lights to finish the curing process. This resin should finish with an opaque and hard surface. Any amount of tackiness left on your prints is just a matter curing and cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Khairullah

customer_reviews.title: Should be named lcd-A : It's light amber, not transparent.
customer_reviews.text: My FHD Sparkmaker arrived and I did not know which resin I wanted to start with. For just a few dollars more I went for the clear resin. Had my first print and overall it was an ok print. Yes, a build error occured and the model is missing some features. I think I might have caused the error also 😑. After I removed the part I noticed the material color is more amber than clear. Even when cool white led lights are shined through the part it glows amber (warm white). In the marketing the parts do not appear these color. My resin was produced November 2018
customer_reviews.author: 2robotguy

customer_reviews.title: Got only one good print out of the whole bottle
customer_reviews.text: Only one good print on a Anycubic Photon. And it was a very small piece. Shook it. Changed it to every single kind of exposure setting I could thing of. It either didn't stick to the build plate, stuck to the print bed, or even worse glued the two together.
customer_reviews.author: C. Harper

customer_reviews.title: NOT!!! for SLA its designed for LCD - it ruined my resin tray!
customer_reviews.text: Not one good print.. would not adhere to the print bed. It damaged my resin tray since then print failed to on the build platform, it printed on the resin tray and burned off several layers of the silicone. Now i am out $280+ becuase the Form 1+ resin tray is now longer being manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great resin for miniatures!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. I use it to print minis for my D&D games and found it to be less brittle than other resins which is good for the type of miniatures that print.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bursac

customer_reviews.title: Decent resin
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent resin to use with the snapdragon maker thingy, wait this is for the sparkmaker sla printer. Um yeah the resin seems to be resin but the sparkmaker well not so sure about how many sparks it makes yet
customer_reviews.author: CJ Beck

customer_reviews.title: Nice and clear.
customer_reviews.text: Clearer than Monoprice Rapid. Yellows with longer-term UV exposure though.
customer_reviews.author: ThorMJ

customer_reviews.title: Good starter resin
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Great budget resin, just don't use it to make anything intended to bear weight. It's pretty brittle.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Exellent and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my dad's printer. So far it has proven to be high quality and works great with his machine!
customer_reviews.author: Austin F.

customer_reviews.title: Rare color nylon alike
customer_reviews.text: I love the nylon alike because its color is the rare hard to find Gary
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Toxic
customer_reviews.text: The resin claims it is safe, however it destroy my skin, my hand became swollen and red after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Theadora Wu

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT FOR BEGGINERS
customer_reviews.text: Great performance with almost any machine ranging from imported to made in USA. Just take care to work in a ventilate area.
customer_reviews.author: Marco A. Vergara

product_meta.title: Sparkmaker 3D Printer SLA Resin LCD-T(500g)
product_meta.description:
Matters needing attention
1. The resin and the printed model do not eat. 
2. The resin must away from children and pets. 
3. The resin must avoid contact with skin and you should wear gloves. 
4. The resin should shake well before use and store in a dark place. 
5. Wash with soap and water if the resin stick to the skin or into the eyes.
feature_bullets: Photosensitive resin for 3d printing with high price – performance ratio. Safe, small smell, low irritation.
For use in SLA UV light source 3d printers & ABS Alike, Super tough, clear and can even be used to engineering components.
For use PEFT film or FEP film resin tank, and its curing wavelength between 355-420nm.
Can be mixed colored pigment into different colors.
This resin provides a great finish and feel.It was designed to simulate ABS plastic and has a comparable tensile strength and modulus.
